twcore.bots.multibot.spaceball
Class spaceball

java.lang.Object
  twcore.bots.MultiModule
      twcore.bots.multibot.spaceball.spaceball

public class spaceball
extends MultiModule

Hosts a game of SpaceBall. Objectives: Prevent the SpaceBall (bot) from reaching your planet's athmosphere by hitting it with bullets and cannonballs. Don't cross your planet's boundaries or your engines will malfunction!

handleEvent

public void handleEvent(PlayerPosition event)
This method handles the PlayerPosition event. If the player isn't in the players HashMap, it registers him. It also checks if the player has crossed the planetary borders and handles cannons.

Overrides:
handleEvent in class MultiModule
Parameters:
event - is the PlayerPosition event to handle

handleEvent

public void handleEvent(WeaponFired event)
This method handles the WeaponFired event. If the projectile is a bomb or bullet it calculates the velocities and adds the projectile to fired_projectiles list.

Overrides:
handleEvent in class MultiModule
Parameters:
event - is the WeaponFired event to handle

gameOver

public void gameOver()
This method is called when the bot has crossed either of the planet's border. It does the gay bursting..

announceWinner

public void announceWinner()
This method announces the winner and stalls the bot for 5 seconds so the bursts wont disappear instantly.

updateState

public void updateState()
This method updates the bot location and detects collisions with walls/projectiles.

checkCollision

public void checkCollision()
This method is called to detect collisions with walls/planet borders. If there is a collision with a wall, the Y velocity is converted to the opposite number and multiplied by 0.9 to slow down the bot a bit ..

noteHit

public void noteHit(Projectile b,
                    int bX,
                    int bY)
This method calculates the new velocities after a collision with a projectile.

Parameters:
b - is the Projectile
bX - is the current bot x location
bY - is the current bot y location
